username: Just Some Guy without a Mustache
comment: Genos is lucky that Saitama wasn't late for a sale, or else he would've accidentally released too much power on that punch.
Genos has some of the coolest fights of the show in general but gets absolutely folded in 99% of them

Genos strongest ability: Using the entire animation budget.

Saitamas strongest ability: being able to make do with the $12 left
He's not in a different kind of level Genos. He is the power level itself.
Saitama gives a little tap on Genos' head. Imagine the infinite control you need to have for that tap to not blow his head off
If that punch hit Genos even the writers can't bring him back.
